entry.title: Vite report on Fri, 11 Aug 2023 14:01:39
entry.summary:
Tech:
- Websites and APIs on Render are currently unavailable due to Cloudflare network errors.
- A user has created a Tetris game where the blocks are ARM instructions that execute in the browser.
- Elon Musk's new round of X Ads Revenue Sharing payments has been received.
- Olivia Rodrigo has released a new song and a new Instagram feature.
- Hands-on review of the Samsung Galaxy Flip 5, highlighting small but important design tweaks.
- The gig economy may be putting Covid in the rearview mirror.
- VR can introduce health problems in the workplace.
- A comparison between virtual and in-person immersive leadership training.
- A Canadian woman received over 50 packages of women's shoes she never ordered and was asked to pay collect-on-delivery fees.
- Discussion on setting JavaScript framework standards, questioning the React-set standard and advocating for Svelte.
- Tips on how to come up with new ideas.
- Michael Wiley from Arizona is considered the most underrated player in the Pac-12.
- Guide on how to earn, use, and maximize United Miles, even for non-frequent flyers.
- Two powerful X-class solar flares from the sun caused radio signal disruptions across the US.
- Introduction of Sensor Watch, a board swap for the classic Casio F-91W wristwatch.
- Robotaxis receive approval to operate 24/7 in California.
- Analysis of the proposed Cybercrime Treaty's international cooperation provisions and their potential impact.
- Waymo and Cruise receive permits for full-day robotaxi operations in SF, LA, and Silicon Valley.
- Wordle puzzle hints, clues, and answers for August 11th.
- List of travel credit cards with benefits worth more than the annual fee.
- Discussion on why building communities on Slack may not be ideal.
- Tips on how to see and hear the Perseid Meteor Peak this weekend.
- The Perseids meteor shower is set to peak this weekend, with experts providing advice on how to see it.
- Wisk and Archer collaborate on air taxis and resolve their legal fight.
- US Special Operations Command is developing a new mini-submarine for transporting SEALs.
- Guide on how to watch the Spain vs. Netherlands Women's World Cup quarter-final live stream for free.
- Introduction to Git scraping, a method of tracking changes over time by scraping to a Git repository.

Insights:
- The Cloudflare network errors have affected the availability of websites and APIs on Render.
- The use of ARM instructions in a Tetris game showcases the potential for executing code in the browser.
- Elon Musk's X Ads Revenue Sharing payments have been distributed.
- Olivia Rodrigo's new song and Instagram feature indicate her continued success.
- The Samsung Galaxy Flip 5 has made important design improvements.
- The gig economy may be recovering from the impact of Covid.
- VR in the workplace can pose health risks.
- The comparison between virtual and in-person leadership training highlights the benefits and drawbacks of each.
- The Canadian woman's experience with receiving unsolicited packages raises concerns about potential scams.
- The discussion on JavaScript framework standards highlights the pros and cons of different approaches.
- Tips on generating new ideas can be helpful for individuals seeking creative inspiration.
- Michael Wiley's underrated status in the Pac-12 suggests his skills may be overlooked.
- Maximizing United Miles can benefit both frequent and non-frequent flyers.
- The solar flares from the sun caused disruptions in radio signals across the US.
- The Sensor Watch offers a unique modification to the classic Casio F-91W wristwatch.
- The approval of 24/7 operation for robotaxis in California is a significant milestone for autonomous vehicles.
- The proposed Cybercrime Treaty's international cooperation provisions raise concerns about potential abuse.
- Waymo and Cruise's permits for full-day robotaxi operations indicate progress in the autonomous vehicle industry.
- Solving the Wordle puzzle requires hints, clues, and the correct answer for August 11th.
- Travel credit cards with valuable benefits can outweigh their annual fees.
- Building communities on platforms other than Slack may offer advantages.
- The Perseid Meteor Peak can be experienced through various methods, including visual and auditory observations.
- The collaboration between Wisk and Archer resolves their legal dispute and promotes the development of air taxis.
- The new mini-submarine being developed by US Special Operations Command showcases advancements in transportation technology.
- Watching the Spain vs. Netherlands Women's World Cup quarter-final can be done through live streaming options.
- Git scraping provides a method for tracking changes over time using a Git repository.

Summary of Insights:
- The tech section covers a range of topics, including website and API availability issues, innovative game development, revenue sharing, music releases, smartphone design, the gig economy, VR health concerns, leadership training, unsolicited packages, JavaScript framework standards, idea generation, underrated athletes, maximizing travel rewards, solar flares, wearable technology, autonomous vehicles, cybercrime treaties, robotaxi permits, puzzles, travel credit cards, community building, meteor showers, legal collaborations, transportation technology, live streaming sports events, and data tracking through Git scraping.
- These insights highlight the diverse and evolving nature of the tech industry, with advancements in various fields and the impact of technology on different aspects of life. The challenges and opportunities presented by new technologies are explored, along with the potential risks and benefits they bring. Overall, the tech industry continues to drive innovation and shape the way we live and work.
